snippet.title: Crazy Chicken Xtreme - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Released in 2022, this is the latest in the long-running Moorhuhn / Crazy Chicken series, which first began all the way back in 2000.

Hunt mischievous moorhuhns across a mystical campsite in the forest, shoot them down in the old walls of a knight's castle, or put your marksmanship to the test in a medieval marketplace.
If a wild chicken gets in the line of fire, blast it with a shotgun, rocket launcher, or chicken-hammer. Quickly load up on ammunition to enjoy maximum shooting action, and the chickens will either have to drop their feathers or end up roasting on the spit!

Moorhuhn / Crazy Chicken, Crazy Chicken Xtreme, Moorhuhn Xtreme (C) Markt+Technik Verlag GmbH / ak tronic Software & Services GmbH
Developed by Korion Interactive
Also released for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #moorhuhn #crazychicken #moorhuhnxtreme #crazychickenxtreme
